annoucement.description: “FIFA world cup is the extreme-level spirited football journey. If u don’t watch it – you should stop watching football.”
“Football World Cup Qatar 2022 will expectably bring football to the Middle East and propagate the stunning game spirit to a never-before region of the planet.”
“You know as a player that you won’t have many opportunities to play in World Cups – so you have to take them when you can.” — Lionel Messi
“I’m sure sex wouldn’t be as rewarding as winning the World Cup. It’s not that good, but the World Cup is every four years and sex is not.” — Cristiano Ronaldo
“I’m not a big fan of the World Cup. I don’t like the way it’s organized. I don’t like the way it’s run. I don’t like the way it’s played.” — David Beckham
“I think the World Cup is the most important tournament in the world. It’s the biggest stage. It’s the biggest competition. It’s the biggest prize.” — Zinedine Zidane
The 2022 FIFA World Cup will be the 22nd FIFA World Cup, a quadrennial
